item.title: Intro to R, R Studio, and R-Ladies
item.description: Our first meetup is in less than 2 weeks! This meetup will be on Tuesday, October 1st at 6 pm at Elborn College, Western University (1201 Western Road) in Room 2510. Elborn is a bit of a maze - see map and directions below. Parking at Elborn is ğŸ’° free ğŸ’° after 4 pm. item.title: Upcoming event: Intro to R and R-Studio
item.description: Quick deets! â“ What is R-Ladies? A low-key get together for people interested in using and learning more about R, a powerful statistical software program. We meet about once a month to feature different topics and speakers. ğŸ•› When: Tuesday, September 25, 5:00 p.m. - 7:00 p.m. ğŸ“Where: London Public Library, Central Branch (251 Dundas, right downtown). We will be in the Training Room (formerly the Wellington Room) on the 2nd floor.
